title: Fitness for Tennis - Stan Nicholes
brief_description: Hosted by Australia’s international tennis champion, Tony Roche (the man responsible for coaching Ivan Lendl on the restructuring of his game), this unique video gathers together some of the world’s tennis greats: Ivan Lendl, Martina Navratilova, Bjorn Borg, John McEnroe, Ken Rosewall, Pam Shriver, and others.
